contents.text: Thank you for calling Clara Analytics, your AI-driven partner in reducing workers' compensation medical costs.
For information on our AI-driven workers’ compensation cost reduction platform, press '1'.
To schedule a personalized demo of our AI platform, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you with a product specialist.

navigationGoals: I’d like to schedule a personalized demo of your AI-driven cost reduction platform.
Book a personalized demo of your AI-driven workers’ compensation cost reduction platform.
I’d like to schedule a personalized technical deep-dive demo of Clara Analytics’ AI-driven workers’ comp cost reduction platform.
I’d like to schedule a personalized demo of your workers’ compensation AI platform and learn how it works.
I’d like to schedule a personalized demo of your AI-driven workers’ compensation cost-reduction platform.

contents.text: To discuss enterprise licensing and partnerships, press '2'.
One moment please, we are transferring you to our partnerships team.

navigationGoals: I need to discuss enterprise licensing options and partnership opportunities.
Discuss enterprise licensing and partnership opportunities.
I want to discuss enterprise licensing, API integration options, and strategic partnerships for your AI analytics solution.
I need to speak with someone about enterprise licensing and partnership opportunities for my organization.
I’m interested in discussing enterprise licensing and partnership opportunities for your AI cost-reduction solution.

contents.text: For support or account services, press '2'.
To get technical support or report an issue, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you with technical support.

navigationGoals: I’m experiencing a technical issue and need support.
Get technical support to resolve an issue accessing my Clara Analytics account.
I need technical support to troubleshoot an API authentication error with your platform.
I’m having trouble accessing my account and need technical support to resolve an issue.
I need technical support with my Clara Analytics account and assistance reporting an issue.

contents.text: For billing questions and account management, press '2'.
Your call is important to us, please hold to speak with our billing department.

navigationGoals: I have a billing question and need to review my account.
Speak with billing to clarify charges on my recent invoice.
I have billing questions about my subscription invoice details and usage-based charges for your analytics service.
I have a question about my recent bill and need help with my billing account.
I have a question about my billing statement and account charges.
